recipe.name: Salmon Mouse
recipe.notes: I am not sure what you could call this in the modern age:  I think this sounds like it could be pretty interesting but I think you'd have a hard sell with "well, its mousse!  Its uh, made with salmon!"  Probably "salmon spread" these days?A bit of a curiosity on the cream measure.  The notation is "1/c" and its added by thirds, so a full cup makes sense.
recipe.preparation: Put gelatin in blender.  Add lemon juice etc + boiling water.  Blend for 40 seconds and turn off.  Add rest of ingredients + blend at high speed until mixed.  Add cream 1/3 at a time.  After each addition blend for a few seconds.  When all cream is in blend for 30 seconds.  Pour into mold and chill
